content.raw:
Hi @pchidamb,

I think http://answers.ros.org/questions/ or https://github.com/turtlebot/turtlebot_simulator would be better places for this. I'm going to close because it doesn't appear to be a gazebo issue.

At first glance it looks like the package [depthimage_to_laserscan](http://wiki.ros.org/depthimage_to_laserscan) isn't installed. Try `sudo apt install ros-kinetic-depthimage-to-laserscan`.
content.html:
Hi @pchidamb,

I think http://answers.ros.org/questions/ or https://github.com/turtlebot/turtlebot_simulator would be better places for this. I'm going to close because it doesn't appear to be a gazebo issue.

At first glance it looks like the package depthimage_to_laserscan isn't installed. Try sudo apt install ros-kinetic-depthimage-to-laserscan.
